abstract: Los Angeles Galaxy, who finished first in regular season, will play New York Red Bulls twice in one week due to quirks of Major League Soccer playoff format.
snippet: The Red Bulls will play host to the high-profile Galaxy, who finished first in the regular season and whose roster includes David Beckham, the biggest name in the league.
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls will play host to the high-profile Galaxy, who finished first in the regular season and whose roster includes David Beckham, the biggest name in the league.

headline.main: For Red Bulls and Galaxy, Two Steps to Success
headline.print_headline: For Red Bulls and Galaxy, Two Steps to Success
headline.seo: Red Bulls and Galaxy Prepare to Play Two
